channel.title: CVE Feed for Mergen Software -- Quality Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mergen Software -- Quality Management System

item.title: CVE-2024-2865|2024-07-17T15:27:28.880Z -- mergen%20software -- quality%20management%20system
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Mergen Software Quality Management System allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Quality Management System: through 25032024.
